response.original_title: Rock 'N Learn: PreSchool! - Phonics for Beginners
response.overview: Here's the entertaining, musical way for kids to learn the most common sound for each letter.  The on-screen mouth shows how to form each sound and encourages learners to participate.  Kids race the clock in a fun game to say letter sounds before hearing answers.  Learners feel proud as they combine letters to read words.
response.title: Rock 'N Learn: PreSchool! - Phonics for Beginners
